name: Techla
members: Priscilla, Johanna, Igor, Igor, Vitor, Alice
description: tech_la is an educational solution for meaningful music learning, specially for children. It is a web platform offering musical activities for begginers, with the option to use a physical low-cost keyboard to enahnce the learning experience.

name: CICLOS
members: Joabson, Rainer, Eduardo, Natalie, Camilla, Raissa
description: Digital Platform for environmental education, destined for kids and teachers

name: ConnecTech
description: We are a platform that offers scholarships to vulnerable students for code courses and connects those students with job opportunities

name: MoodlePod
members: José Renato Castro Milanez (UNIFEI), Mariana de Sá Gândara (CESAR School), Jussara Edna Meira da Silva (IFMT)
description: It´s a text-to-speech/speech-to-text device to improve blind students' experience on the Moodle platform.
